rules.natural: If lead is approved as a substance, then air quality improvement goal is achieved.
Either lead is approved as a substance or a compliance officer job is created.
A filtration system device is required or a safety inspector job is required.
In case a safety inspector job is required, it is not the case that asbestos is banned as a substance.
Should a health effects study be published, emission standards regulation is updated.
A health effects study is published or compliance findings report is issued.
If compliance findings report is issued, then facility inspections audit is conducted.
Assuming facility inspections audit is conducted, then either the Clean Air Act legislation is amended or if a filtration system device is required then asbestos is not banned as a substance.
Given that a compliance officer job is created, an emissions monitor device is registered.

If the EPA agency is funded, then if it is not the case that the Clean Air Act legislation is enacted implies that if an emissions monitor device is registered then air quality improvement goal is achieved, then an impact study review is commissioned.

Should an environmental oversight department be created, then if it is not the case that the Clean Air Act legislation is enacted implies that if an emissions monitor device is registered then air quality improvement goal is achieved, then an impact study review is commissioned.
If a monitoring program budget is approved, then the EPA agency is funded.
Either a monitoring program budget is approved or a compliance team taskforce is formed.
Provided a compliance team taskforce is formed, an environmental oversight department is created.
If it is not the case that if an emissions monitor device is registered then air quality improvement goal is achieved, then a violation fine penalty is imposed.

Under the condition that it is not the case that the Clean Air Act legislation is enacted implies that if an emissions monitor device is registered then air quality improvement goal is achieved, then an impact study review is not commissioned.

In case it is not the case that if it is not the case that if it is not the case that if it is not the case that if an emissions monitor device is registered then air quality improvement goal is achieved implies that it is not the case that a violation fine penalty is imposed implies that an industry association appeal is filed implies that a regulatory board hearing is scheduled, then an administrative law ruling is issued.
If air quality improvement goal is not achieved, then asbestos is banned as a substance.

The Clean Air Act legislation is not amended.
Emission standards regulation is not updated.
An industry association appeal is not filed.
A regulatory board hearing is not scheduled.
An administrative law ruling is not issued.
